name: Dino Beach VolleyBomb
description:
Hello!

The game Beach BombVolley is a relaxing game that I made combined 2 of things that I like Beach and Dinos!

Hit the ball in the fruits to get points, but be careful with the bombs.



How to Play?

🦘Press spacebar to Jump,

⬅➡ A and D as directional

📱My game is mobile friendly, so if you playing on the touch the buttons should appear.

🍀Any donations are very well appreciated on my career as developer 💙

Thank you so much for playing my game!

Update 0.1 - Adjusted music and touch buttons.

Update 0.2 - Increased bouncy in the Ball.
